A convenient easy-access pocket on the back ensures quick retrieval, while the secure front flap keeps everything safely in place. We take pride in our craftsmanship, which is why this wallet comes with a Lifetime Guarantee . One of our most popular and innovative cardholder designs, the Origa Elite , is perfect for those who value maximum functionality in a minimal form. Crafted from a single piece of full-grain leather, this cardholder develops a unique patina over time, gaining more character with every use. Thanks to its stitch-free construction, it has no weak points and will remain durable for years to come. It holds up to 12 cards and cash in one main compartment while maintaining a slim and elegant profile. The easy-access pocket on the back allows for quick use, while the secure front flap keeps everything extra safe. We are extremely confident in our craftsmanship, which is why this product comes with a Lifetime Guarantee. Crafted from a single piece of high-quality full-grain leather, the Origa Mini will develop a unique patina over time, adding character with each use. With no stitching, there are no weaknesses to this wallet, meaning it will remain functional for decades. Designed to carry 6–8 cards and folded cash in one main compartment while keeping a super slim profile. The back of the wallet features an "easy-access" pocket . The front flap tucks securely to keep the contents extra safe. We are extremely confident in our craftsmanship and this wallet comes with a Lifetime Guarantee . A sleek and practical wallet created for those who want to carry their cash and cards in style without unnecessary bulk. The Trifold Slim is expertly crafted from premium full-grain leather, ensuring it not only looks better with age but also develops a beautiful patina that adds character over time. Meticulously hand-stitched for exceptional durability, this wallet is made to last for decades. With the capacity to hold up to 15 bills and 8 cards , its smart layout includes two card compartments and a generous cash pocket that accommodates unfolded bills with ease. The secure flap closure keeps everything safely in place, making it the perfect blend of function and craftsmanship. Backed by our Lifetime Guarantee , this wallet is designed to serve you for years to come. Who is Toprank Leather?

Toprank Leather is an American small business
specializing in handcrafted, high-quality leather goods. We use genuine full-grain leather — the most durable and natural part of the hide — to create timeless, long-lasting designs. Every piece is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring exceptional quality and a unique character that develops a beautiful patina over time.

metadata.question: Who is Toprank Leather?

text:
Is Toprank Leather an American brand?

Yes, Toprank Leather is a registered American brand and is officially trademarked with the USPTO (United States Patent and Trademark Office -US Serial Number:98223004).

metadata.question: Is Toprank Leather an American brand?

text:
How are Toprank Leather products made?

Our leather products are entirely handcrafted from start to finish. Every step — from cutting to stitching — is done by hand using premium full-grain leather and expert craftsmanship. We blend traditional leatherworking techniques with timeless designs to ensure exceptional quality and a unique character in every piece.

metadata.question: How are Toprank Leather products made?

text:
What type of leather do you use?

We use only the highest quality leather — full-grain leather, known for being the most durable and natural part of the hide. Specifically, we work with vegetable-tanned leather, which develops a beautiful patina over time, and crazy horse leather, which gains a unique aged character with use.

metadata.question: What type of leather do you use?

text:
Do you follow sustainable and ethical production practices?

Yes. At Toprank Leather, we are committed to sustainable and ethical craftsmanship. We source our full-grain leather from trusted suppliers who follow responsible tanning processes, ensuring minimal environmental impact. Every product is handcrafted in small batches, reducing waste and promoting quality over mass production. We value fair working conditions and take pride in creating timeless leather goods that are made to last — a more sustainable choice compared to fast fashion.

metadata.question: Do you follow sustainable and ethical production practices?

text:
Where are your products made?

Every Toprank Leather piece is handcrafted one by one in our small workshop in Turkey, where skilled artisans carefully cut and stitch each item. We’re not a factory, but a small business — which means every product gets special attention. Toprank Leather is a proudly registered American brand, serving customers across the U.S.

metadata.question: Where are your products made?

text:
What product categories do you offer?

We offer a wide range of leather goods — from wallets and eyeglass cases to cardholders and keychains. Some of these items are
Ready to Ship
, available for immediate delivery, while others are
Personalized
, made to order with custom details.

metadata.question: What product categories do you offer?

text:
Are leather products water-resistant?

Genuine leather is not fully waterproof due to its natural pores, but applying a quality leather balm or waterproofing spray can significantly improve its water resistance. We recommend occasional treatment to help protect your leather goods from water damage while maintaining their natural beauty.

metadata.question: Are leather products water-resistant?

text:
How do I clean my leather product?

Gently wipe your leather item with a soft, damp cloth and avoid using chemical cleaners, as they may damage the leather’s natural finish. For long-term care, apply a high-quality leather conditioner every few months to maintain its softness, prevent cracking, and keep it looking its best.

metadata.question: How do I clean my leather product?

text:
How should I store my leather products?

Store your leather goods in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight to prevent fading and drying. When not in use, keep them in a breathable cloth bag or box to protect them from dust while allowing air circulation. Avoid storing leather in plastic bags, as they can trap moisture and cause damage over time.

metadata.question: How should I store my leather products?

text:
Can I personalize my product? (name, date, thread color, leather color)

Yes! All items in our
Personalized
category can be fully customized from start to finish — including the leather color, stitching thread color, and even the finish of the metal hardware. We handcraft each piece to your specifications, making it truly one of a kind.

metadata.question: Can I personalize my product? (name, date, thread color, leather color)

text:
Do you offer gift wrapping or custom message cards?

Yes. For our personalized products, we offer a
gift wrapping service
for an additional fee. We also provide
message cards
with a standard text. You can let us know in the order notes who the gift is for, and we will prepare the card addressed to that person.

metadata.question: Do you offer gift wrapping or custom message cards?

text:
Do you offer bulk or corporate orders?

Yes, we do. At Toprank Leather, we can accommodate bulk and corporate orders for events, employee gifts, client appreciation, weddings, and more. Our handcrafted full-grain leather goods can be personalized with names, dates, or logos to make each piece truly special. For bulk pricing and customization options, please contact us directly — we’ll work with you to create high-quality, unique products tailored to your needs.

metadata.question: Do you offer bulk or corporate orders?

text:
Do you offer a warranty or repair service?

Yes. All Toprank Leather products come with a
lifetime stitching guarantee
. We stand behind our products 100%. If the leather tears, the stitching comes loose, or you encounter any other craftsmanship-related issue, we will repair or replace your item at no cost — no questions asked.

metadata.question: Do you offer a warranty or repair service?

text:
Which countries do you ship to?

Our
Ready to Ship
products are pre-stocked items available exclusively for delivery within the United States.
Personalized
products are made to order and can be shipped worldwide.

metadata.question: Which countries do you ship to?

text:
Will I receive a tracking number?

Yes. For all orders, you can access your tracking number directly from your order details page. This tracking number allows you to monitor your shipment in real time.

metadata.question: Will I receive a tracking number?

text:
How long does shipping take?

The average production and delivery time for all our products is provided on each product’s page.

metadata.question: How long does shipping take?

text:
Do you offer free shipping? (and from what order amount)

Yes. We offer
free standard shipping
within the United States for orders over $75, applicable only to products in our
Ready to Ship
category. For orders below this amount, shipping costs will be calculated at checkout. International shipping rates vary based on destination and will be displayed before you complete your purchase.

metadata.question: Do you offer free shipping? (and from what order amount)

text:
Which shipping carriers do you use?

For local deliveries within the United States, we work with trusted regional carriers. For worldwide shipments, we use express services such as
DHL Express
,
UPS Express
, and
FedEx Express
to ensure your products reach you as quickly as possible.

metadata.question: Which shipping carriers do you use?

text:
Can I return my order?

As a standard procedure, returns are accepted within
30 days
for unused and unopened products. However, if there is ever a defect caused by us, your item is covered by our lifetime guarantee — you can contact us at any time for a repair or replacement.

metadata.question: Can I return my order?

text:
How do I start a return or exchange?

You can request a return within
30 days
, no questions asked. Our
Return Request Form
is available on our website — simply fill it out to start your return process. We typically review and approve return requests the same day, so we can get your return or exchange started as quickly as possible.

metadata.question: How do I start a return or exchange?

text:
How long do I have to return an item?

You can return unused and unopened products within
30 days
of purchase. If the product has a defect caused by us, it is covered by our
lifetime guarantee
, and you can contact us anytime for a repair or replacement.

metadata.question: How long do I have to return an item?

text:
Are personalized products eligible for return?

Personalized products are
not eligible for return
unless there is a defect caused by us. In such cases, your item is covered by our lifetime craftsmanship guarantee, and we will repair or replace it at no cost.

metadata.question: Are personalized products eligible for return?

text:
What payment methods do you accept?

We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, and other secure payment methods.

metadata.question: What payment methods do you accept?

text:
Are taxes included in the prices?

Yes, U.S. sales tax is included in the prices. International customers may be responsible for customs duties and import taxes.

metadata.question: Are taxes included in the prices?

text:
Do you accept installment payments or payment plans?

Yes. We offer installment payment options through PayPal Pay Later and other secure payment providers, depending on your location. Available options will be displayed at checkout.

metadata.question: Do you accept installment payments or payment plans?
